description:
The Hooké Expedition shorts are ideal for mountain climbing, canoe camping or everyday wear. Made of nylon and spandex, the fabric is stretchy, durable and quick drying. This is the ultimate versatile lightweight short!

With 4 convenient mesh-lined pockets for breathability and 2 cargo pockets on the thighs to keep essentials close at hand, you'll feel like you're one with these shorts!

Made of 90% nylon and 10% spandex, they will be your best ally for your outdoor adventures as well as your everyday life!
name: Hooke Expedition Shorts - Mens
